website_summaries.verdict: These youth-sized skates are lighter on your feet than most rental skates. They're more comfortable, with a heel stabilizer and padded collar.
pros: Constructed with padded collar, laces, and hook-and-loop power strap
54-millimeter wheels are clear urethane with Pro Corebearings
Lighter in weight than most rental skates
cons: May run small, so keep this in mind when ordering
Wheels do not turn particularly freely

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and looks great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter generally use size 5 for regular shoes and size 6 for this fits perfectly . These look great and works great , my daughter love them.
customer_reviews.author: Chandu

customer_reviews.title: Watch your ordering size
customer_reviews.text: Just a note...these are NOT in women's sizes. I ordered an 8 and it was huge. The skates look really nice and hopefully when I get the right size I can enjoy them. I wear a 7.5 or 8 in women's shoes so these had to be in men's sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: cute, but wheels don't easily turn.
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute skates and my daughter liked that there was a non-pink option for girls skates. However, the wheels do not easily turn making it difficult to skate--and certainly not quickly. So, we are returning and looking for another pair of good skates
customer_reviews.author: Kathrun

customer_reviews.title: Good quality skates.
customer_reviews.text: Nice skates! Bought these for my 12 year old granddaughter and she loves them. Very stylish and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Gator Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good skates good price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears a size 4 and we got a size four and they fit well, there is a little room to grow but not to big in her. They skate well and look nice, we have been wearing them often and they are holding up well!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1st Pair of Skates
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in a size 3 for an 8yr old who wears a size 2 shoe. They are a bit large, but the lacing system allows them to be cinched onto the foot, and I'm glad there's room for growth. They seem perfect for a beginner. Smooth rolling, decent toe stops, so far they have been sturdy (holding up to sidewalks/asphalt, and quite a few spills) and fairly easy to wipe clean. I would buy them again, and just might!
customer_reviews.author: ARCEE

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Brand new, good. Didn't realize they would be bad for skating on concrete and other rough places, but that's my fault. Skates are pretty nice! I also regret getting these in white.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Skate
customer_reviews.text: This skate runs at least two sizes larger than your shoes size. It is a nice sturdy fast skate though. The wheels have a lot if grip making it a bit harder to freestyle.
customer_reviews.author: SJP

customer_reviews.title: I used this for like 4 times and now they stay in our closet
customer_reviews.text: Big waste of money but well, My kid was having a great time
customer_reviews.author: Kaley

customer_reviews.title: Once we returned my daughter's actual shoe size and ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: Once we returned my daughter's actual shoe size and ordered the next size up, they fit perfectly and she LOVES them! These are for indoor/outdoor use is a real plus.
customer_reviews.author: Unikitty

customer_reviews.title: Nice...But run big!
customer_reviews.text: These skates are really nice!....However they do run big! I ordered the size 07 based on reviews...they sent a size 7 that fit like a 9. I wear a size 8. Based on the fit, I probably could wear the size 06 (which is now out of stock). I'm very disappointed that I have to return them! Hope this helps in making your decision.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roller skating....
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my nine year old granddaughter and she loves them and I just only wish that we could go skating more often.
customer_reviews.author: Lottie Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of these skates considering to cost. My granddaughter is having a blast!
customer_reviews.author: judy platt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves these very traditional roller skates. Made in the U.S.A. Fit and roll beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: B L

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the size and was hopeful it wasn't a child's size. I bought this for my 19 year old daughter for Christmas who wears a size 7 womens'. Fit perfectly! She skates everywhere. She has a turtle costume (full plush outfit) that she likes to wear with these skates on. She's such a clown. The skates are great quality and are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Robbie L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Size 8 but fits like a 10.
customer_reviews.text: The skates are beautiful. My comfort size is 9 but I ordered size 8 after reading reviews on Roller Derby's brand and they are still a bit roomy. Will order size 7 next time.
customer_reviews.author: Jasz

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: Great skates. Comfortable, runs one size larger than stated, wheels are more for outside but can easily be changed. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: kristi schneider

customer_reviews.title: These roller skates are very well made and roll super smooth. Just keep in mind that they are ...
customer_reviews.text: These roller skates are very well made and roll super smooth. Just keep in mind that they are in men's sizes, I am a size 6 women and purchased a size 6, the skates are little big but I can still use them fine and they're comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: pucus

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It's good, my daughter love it. But the size is a bit too large than normal size
customer_reviews.author: CUIFANG G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my niece. She uses them nearly every day now for about three months. They are still in terrific condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be quality product. my 9 year old loves them. She's a 4 in shoes still but the size 5 skate fit her great.
customer_reviews.author: Cara L. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These skates are great. I purchased a used pair and they arrived looking brand new. I love the blue and white color and skating on them was great. I recommend these skates. Blue is best :)
customer_reviews.author: LupeH

customer_reviews.title: Like these.
customer_reviews.text: These were a Christmas gift for my daughter. She likes them. I do think the quality was higher than I expected them to be for the price. They aren't as nice as some of the skates that cost $100, but then again she's going to grow out of them and spending too much money would be silly. I love these for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: These have been great skates for my 11 year old. She's taught herself how to skate in these and they roll very smoothly. I'd definitely recommend them. The quality is good, as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Tolerable but not exceptional
customer_reviews.text: Undortunately Im dissappointed in these. They will do, but the size 6 is more like a size 8 and they were not assembled properly (when sitting on a flat surface only 3 wheels touch the ground). I bought a pair of size 2 a few years ago and they were excellent, I would rate them with 5 stars, they were by the same company but a line that had purple (no longer offered).
customer_reviews.author: Deneka L. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a size 8 for my 11 year old daughter, she can also wear a size 6 in youth. She said they fit alittle snug but did break in after wears, she loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We are on our second year using these. They are made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Great Skates!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter to skate for her skating bday party. They worked great and she said they were comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J.L.O.

customer_reviews.title: Great skates!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 10 year-old granddaughter for her birthday--she loved them! They seem to run true to size, fit very well and she says they are comfortable and nicely padded.I ordered one size larger than her shoe size to give her room to grow. They have hardly left her feet since she first tried them on. Good quality for the money too.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Taylor Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for my granddaughter...she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: paula karlberg

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grand daoughter and she loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Encourager

customer_reviews.title: These skates are fantastic! They are fast once you start moving
customer_reviews.text: These skates are fantastic! They are fast once you start moving, but not slippery or hard to stand in.
customer_reviews.author: EekLixer49

customer_reviews.title: The size runs a bit large but I like that because they will fit my daughter for awhile
customer_reviews.text: The size runs a bit large but I like that because they will fit my daughter for awhile. Great skates!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blue is for Girls!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wanted blue skates instead of pink. Skates came in 2 days just in time for her skating party. Velcro strap is nice and keeps the strings from hanging down and getting tangled in the wheels. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: ShaSiz

customer_reviews.title: Get the skates and have enough $ to enter the rink
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality skates. Got them for our niece and she loved them. I've skated a LOT in my day and could tell these were a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenae Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Best birthday present! !
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old grandaughter loves these skates. She likes the style, color and fit. This is her first pair of skates and she is enthusiastic about learning. Big hit!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Christian

customer_reviews.title: Girl skate
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a Christmas gift for my granddaughter and she will love them, I also bought some poof balls in blue to match so they look more girlish. These skates are great quality, very durable and really look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our 10 year old granddaughter and she didn't take them off for 3 days. I think she slept in them
customer_reviews.author: movie buff

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and perfect for my 11 year old
customer_reviews.text: She received them as a Christmas gift and loves them. We couldn't be more pleased with their comfort, ease of getting on and she also enjoys the look. She is not in to all the pink and purple girly skates!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: its perfect, its design is not so cool but it works
customer_reviews.author: RODRIGO DE LA GARZA S

customer_reviews.title: cute and well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Girl's size 5 - I wear a woman's size 6-6.5 and they fit very well - my toes do not touch the end. I think kid shoes are sized like men shoes. The boot goes up to my ankle. It helps with support, but might rub blisters until I break them in. I might have to find something to pad that area. The wheels are nice and grippy (meant for outside). For those saying they are heavy/clunky, I must say they are much lighter than the rink rentals I wore a few weeks ago. I love these so far, I hope to get a lot of use out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Belshan

customer_reviews.title: She Loved Them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my granddaughters birthday. She loved them and was skating in a matter of minutes. I don't know much about skates but they seemed well made.
customer_reviews.author: Holly K. West

customer_reviews.title: ... the wheels and they are very heavy but work great
customer_reviews.text: I don't care to much for the wheels and they are very heavy but work great
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicer than I expected. If only my kids' feet didn't grow so quickly!
customer_reviews.author: John T. Eirich

customer_reviews.title: Happy Mom
customer_reviews.text: I bought the skates as a bday present and daughter loved them. My daughter says they're comfortable and had no problem skating around with them. They run true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Selina Chacon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 8 year old and she loves them,
customer_reviews.author: Fussy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Lets go and skate
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutly loved these skates. As well ad i did to. She would still be rolling if she didnt grow out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Geecheemeat

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter was hoping for purple color, but blue was a strong second. So far she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: FRA+KPA

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly! Took a good week for the wheels to break in good enough..but my daughter loves them & that's what counts!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good skates
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Run true to size. My daughter is 10 and I got her a size 4. No problems. She loves them
customer_reviews.author: cjones

customer_reviews.title: ROLLER DERBY BABY
customer_reviews.text: Bought these skates for granddaughter. She is eight and it was her birthday. Talk about surprise...wow. Now she has "big girl" skates. Showed her some old roller derby action from old videos. Skates are great. Excellent quality and fit. Nice looking too! Excellent support for the ankles and comfortable after hours of skating. Skates were delivered on time, were as advertised and a fair price considering the quality of the skate. So...it's a win/win
customer_reviews.author: Frank Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: The sketes are nice, but they could use better bearings.
customer_reviews.author: Notmyname

customer_reviews.title: fast service and look great
customer_reviews.text: I received these early by one day. They look great. Today I gave them to my granddaughter for her birthday. Will know tomorrow if she likes them or not.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen K.

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of skates
customer_reviews.text: Received the skates before Christmas as promised. My grand daughter loves these skates and is flying around the skating rink!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: skates
customer_reviews.text: The girls love their skates. Have had tons'o'fun with them. the quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog fini
customer_reviews.author: Joe Breig

customer_reviews.title: They fit great. She loves them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in a size 3 for my daughter who normally wears a size 2Y. They fit great. She loves them!!
customer_reviews.author: RitaB

customer_reviews.title: Another awesome gift!
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for my 10 year old neice who learned how to skate in about 10 minutes :). She loves these skates and even won a skate race with them on. They really are great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Antron Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Summer fun.. 😊
customer_reviews.text: I bought these skates for my 13 year old daughter and she absolutely loves these skates..Summer fun..😊
customer_reviews.author: Zariah Freeman

customer_reviews.title: fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter for her 10th b-day last month-she LOVES them. she says they are super comfy and has skated nearly every day for a month on our hardwoods! I ordered her regular shoe size and they fit great! Couldn't be happier about the price and quality for these. I want a pair now!
customer_reviews.author: lhiggins

customer_reviews.title: Roll On!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these skates for my granddaughter for an early birthday gift. She is 12 and has just learned to skate. These are very nice skates. Seem to be well made. She has had no problems with them. She wears a size 4 shoe so I ordered a size larger and they were perfect. She loves these skates!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Strickler

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved them. The fit was great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved them. The fit was great...a bit roomy..they will fit for awhile..extra socks . Comfortable. We took them to indoor rink and she skated like a pro!
customer_reviews.author: DONNA

customer_reviews.title: Great skates!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just outgrew her Chicago adjustable skates that she has been using for the last two years. She loves the fit and feel of these and can skate significantly faster with these. They are true to size! She wears a size 5 in girls so we ordered the 7 in women's and they still give her a little room to grow!
customer_reviews.author: dreamer68

customer_reviews.title: Nice skates
customer_reviews.text: Excelent deal for a good solid skate. My daughter is very pleased with them. I believe I will be ordering extra wheels since she likes to skate outside too.
customer_reviews.author: CaliSpice

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Grandaughter for her nineth birthday.She put them on and away she went ! Awesome product !
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne L.Sayce

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I loved these roller skates and bought them for my daughter. I was dissapointed to find out they were boys skates and boy sizes. Which meant of course they were far too large for her. Oh well, we live in Germany so it wasnt worth the time or effort to send them back. THey are super cute though and I do recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: ~Terri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size larger and they are perfect. A little big to grow into them!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda S.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The skates are too big, but based on the reviews, we decided to get them for our 8 year old daughter. She wears an extra pair of socks and we're able to tighten then enough that it's no big deal. Her feet are only going to get bigger, so in the end, we'll save on the skates! She loves them and has been skating around the house for weeks! We are going to a roller rink today and she is bringing them to wear instead of the rental skates! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: T. Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Great Skated
customer_reviews.text: This item came on time. My daughter loves it! The size is a about a 1/2 size larger but she will definitely grow into them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen S. Mayes

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: used others review size chart that helped, arrived quickly, very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: My daughter thinks she is the coolest looking thing at the rink! Very cool pair of skates and them seem to be made well.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey burke

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pair of skates
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pair of skates. My daughter usually wears a size 3-3.5 and she said that the size 4's fit her very comfortably. Shipping on these skates was very prompt, within 4 days of ordering. She used them outside on the sidewalk for a couple hours and they seemed to be very solidly made.
customer_reviews.author: sherf

customer_reviews.title: she loved
customer_reviews.text: Brought these for my daughter for Christmas, she loved them
customer_reviews.author: lacretia hardin-boone

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.text: We were going to go with some of the highly rated 'beginner' skates at first. We tried some of the same ones at a store nearby and found they didn't roll well at all. The kids would have no longer been beginners within a week and needed something better. The 'speed' skates were exactly what we needed. My two daughters 12, 10 who aren't great skaters yet, but have been a few times are doing great in these. Very glad we didn't settle for the 'beginner' ones. They also like them much better than the inline skates we tried. Much more stable and fun for inside.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Size ran one size smaller
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears a size 2 shoe and I ordered a 3. When I received it, it was smashing her toes too small. Had to return!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Kids skates
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wanted skates for her birthday, so naturally I had to get the younger granddaughter a pair of skates also. They love them! The wheels are non marring on hardwood floors, and still tough enough to be used out doors.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: good skates
customer_reviews.text: We got these for my daughter's 11th birthday and she loved them. They fit good with no problems. They glide is smooth and the shell is durable. The inside is soft and the velcro closure is sturdy. The blue color is exactly as pictures and the white is crisp and clean, even after multiple uses. Thebox arrived quickly and in great shape. A very good purchase from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roller Derby
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves these skates. She used them to go to a Birthday party at a skating rink. The skates arrived a few days before the party.
customer_reviews.author: Luckylad

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a Christmas gift for my daughter. She loves them. They are really cute and the wheels roll pretty smooth.
customer_reviews.author: S. Givens-Coley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great team! My daughter loved it. Just don't forget to duck tape the front.
customer_reviews.author: El Chango

customer_reviews.title: quality product, quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: we had no complaints about this product. it was as exactly advertised and came within just a few days after ordering. the only bad thing was we ordered the wrong size. we needed a 5 instead of a 6, but that was user error, nothing to do with the seller or the product.
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: love the skates
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these skates for my daughters birthday. Roller skates were the only thing she asked for. I was really feeling the pressure to get skates that were not only going to be comfortable but easy to learn on. Well needless to say they were a hit!! She broke them in quickly and I noticed that she was having no problems with the weight of the skates. She never complained about the way that the skates felt on her ankles either which was another concearn. Great skates!!
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Men's Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but terrible sizing. I ordered Girl's size 6 and received a box that said 6 but they were too big. They are more like Men's Sizes. As a comparision, I put them by my Women's size 7 skates, which were smaller than these 6 skates. Going to return them. Not trusting the company's sizes.
customer_reviews.author: ESV

customer_reviews.title: Great skates - I have a very happy 9 yr old
customer_reviews.text: These skates arrived earlier than expected. They were securely packaged and just as described. My daughter has worn them skating several times and said they are comfortable and roll smoothly. They appear to be well made and function as we expected. Happy mom, happy kid - what more could we ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice skates
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Went a little larger than my daughter's size and she is able to skate great with a little grow in room. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Caution: Sizes are men's sizes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my shoe size based on another review that said the size was true to women's sizing. Do not make the mistake I did. Sizes displayed are absolutely NOT the womens's sizes. I am exchanging for the corroect size. Other than the size being wrong, the skates looked nice.
customer_reviews.author: katiedid

customer_reviews.title: great skate
customer_reviews.text: fits my daughter perfectly with room to grow, durable velcro strap, great skate, worth the money, i will buy another pair when she outgrows these, company, fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: C. Kealey

product_meta.title: Roller Derby Girl's Laser Speed Quad Skate
product_meta.description: Perfect for those who love to skate, the Roller Derby Laser 7.9 Girl's Speed Roller Skate offers performance and comfort in a speed skate design.
feature_bullets: Boot: Reinforced comfort fit boot with heel stabilizer, padded collar, and laces & Velcro power strap
Wheels: 54mm Clear Urethane with Pro Core
